welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pennsville, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millville Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
